title: Scotland Picturesque and Traditional. A pilgrimage with staff and knapsack
author: Todd, George Eyre.
snippet: Accordingly the combined forces ofGrant and Macgregor made an assault on Freuchie, and, by theirstratagem and bravery, took the castle.

title: Scotland Picturesque and Traditional. A pilgrimage with staff and knapsack
author: Todd, George Eyre.
snippet: The pair, with thirtyfollowers, fled to Strathspey, and found a hiding-place in Huntly'sCave * not far from the castle, then knoAvn as Freuchie.

title: Scotland Picturesque and Traditional. A pilgrimage with staff and knapsack
author: Todd, George Eyre.
snippet: and next by the Cuminings of Freuchie, noAv Castle Grant.
